import ENV from'./../config.js';var API_HOST=ENV.api_host;// get profile information by user id
export var get_user_profile_info=function get_user_profile_info(app,userid){var url="".concat(API_HOST,"/get_user_info/")+userid;fetch(url).then(function(res){if(res.status===200){return res.json();}}).then(function(json){app.setState({json:json});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};
